website_summaries.verdict: A handy, fast-drying wine glass marker that goes on smoothly.
pros: These fast-drying markers come in 8 vivid metallic colors and don't smudge even with direct hand contact
The pointed marker tips produce neat, crisp lines
Markers will last a long time, especially when stored upside down
cons: Markers don't fully wash off in dishwasher – best to hand wash

It doesn't always come off in the dishwasher (this might be different for plastic versus glass), so I just wash with soap to get the marker off and then put in the dishwasher. Pretty inexpensive solution! I recommend this as a way to label food containers instead of labels or tape.

Fun Party Wine Glass Markers for Every Special Occasion 
Did you ever wish there was a way to keep track of your drink glass during weddings, parties and other events? Have you ever lost your glass and wondered which was yours among many? If so, then our wine glass marker pens are the ideal solution for you! 
Simple and Entertaining 
These pens write on any kind of glass or ceramic surface easily, giving you a way to personalize your drink or leave fun messages for others. Draw something cute on all guest glasses, personalize each stem glass or write the menu on a plate, these markers offer an unlimited choice of fun ways to mark your glassware. 
Safe and Clean 
The ink of these wine glass writers is perfectly safe and food grade, so there is no need to worry about touching or accidentally tasting it. Whatever you write won’t smear after 3 minutes of drying and won’t come off until you want to! Just use warm soap water and your glasses and plates will be back to how they were before without any mark left. 
Enjoy a multitude of Uses 
These markers can be used to write on glass jars, windows, and ceramic items. Ideal to label presents, wine bottles, canning jars and whatever else comes to mind. Ideal for wine enthusiasts, party hosts and creative minds!
